stimulusHtml: Which of the following was a long-term result of the historical process represented by the image?

features.html:
• The largest crucifix is in the center.
  • Above the largest crucifix is a small crucifix.
  • Below the largest crucifix is another small crucifix.

Gift of Ernst Anspach, 1999. The Metropolitan Museum of Art.

choicesHtml: The construction of the Great Enclosure as a site for religious activities and its eventual role as a symbol of the prominence of the Shona kings
The rejection of Roman Catholicism by King Nzinga a Nkuwu and his sonâ€™s decision to join the Ethiopian Orthodox Church
The development of stronger ties between Kongo and Portugal that led the Portuguese king to demand access to the trade of enslaved people
The development of centers of learning in Timbuktu that attracted scholars, including astronomers, mathematicians, architects, and jurists
